response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to me, and I believe it could be equally valuable to you. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents an exceptional deal, considering its true worth, and I am confident it will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
